data.system_settings: iPhone 6S, iOS 10.3.3 & iPad Air 2, iOS 11 Golden Master
data.actual_result: The role is displayed with a black color
data.expected_result: The role should be displayed with the same blue color like the `@here` or user mention
data.short_description: Roles for role mentions with default color will be displayed with black color
data.steps_to_repro: - Create/have a role with the default color - Mention a role with default color - See the color of the role you have mentioned
